name: B Edge Storm Down Jacket - Men's

features: High quality by applying wild color silver fox FUR detail
MZR-USA IDEAL magnetic zipper structure on the front part makes it easy to wear the product
Easy storage by applying waterproof zipper on chest and side pockets
Excellent warmth by applying velor fabric at the bottom pocket, inside the collar, and at the cuffs
Used RE:DOWN, an eco-friendly down jacket, and is lightweight and excellent in heat retention
All-weather style that can be worn warmly in everyday life and in various environments
Product management is easy through NFC linkage with LG’s clothing care product, the styler.
